casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bobby Dewayne HELMS 397A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Helms, Bobby Dewayne.

James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill.

Alexandra Gruber, Assistant Attorney General, Erin Gibbs, Associate Attorney General, Trey Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of December 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."

*803Defendant shall have up to and including the 7th day of January 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
